credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: M&Co: M/ Serving the Nation
description: A white triangle, outlined in dark blue, is set within a red border. Just below the apex of the triangle and overlaying the sides is a silhouette in blue of a map of the United States; the letter M in a bold sans serif font in white is centered on the map. Just below, Serving the Nation is imprinted in miniscule italics. Four red horizontal lines, introduced by To, define the addressee space. The M&Co name and address are imprinted in blue capitals just above the base of the triangle.
name: label
